Question: Astrodesign Inc. CES 2024 product highlight and specification
Summary:
Astrodesign Inc.

CES 2024 Product Highlight

- Introducing the latest 8K video processor
- Supports HDMI 2.1 and DisplayPort 2.0
- Features real-time HDR to SDR conversion
- Offers advanced color grading and correction capabilities
- Equipped with high-quality noise reduction algorithms
- Enables seamless integration with professional video production workflows
